---
title: Phytoplankton Photos
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

install.packages("slickR")
library(slickR)

```

## Harmful Algal Bloom (HAB) Species

![Alexandrium](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640485-5109e208-8872-437a-abff-3bc33d1eb7a1.jpg)
![Dinophysis](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640490-858ee131-4058-4af9-98e9-3f97b07adcbe.jpg)
![Pseudo_nitzschia](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640497-644f66bd-5da2-4905-82cc-322025454d54.jpg)


```{r echo=FALSE} 

paths_hab <- c(
  "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640485-5109e208-8872-437a-abff-3bc33d1eb7a1.jpg",
  "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640490-858ee131-4058-4af9-98e9-3f97b07adcbe.jpg",
  "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640497-644f66bd-5da2-4905-82cc-322025454d54.jpg"
)

names_hab <- c(
  "Alexandrium",
  "Dinophysis",
  "Pseudo-nitzschia"
  )
  
slickR(obj=paths_hab, height = 250, width = "75%") %synch%
( slickR(obj=names_hab, slideType = 'p') + settings(arrows = FALSE) )

```

## Common Diatom Species

![Chaetoceros](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640608-835da107-f66b-4f6b-b510-3b85bb2e38f5.jpg)
![Skeletonema](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640621-b8454f91-65a4-4be8-9572-e61fdb7b3c08.jpg)
![Thalassionema](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640634-1542bf75-6c08-42b4-8789-f62444de32f9.jpg)
![Thalassiosira](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/203640614-4978d394-4c40-4e77-99e8-77e60375018e.jpg)

Reference:

```{r echo=FALSE} 

paths <- c(
  "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/202547401-8a69120b-14dc-4bd3-8d75-3ca8eebe71b9.jpg",
  "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/202547412-eec82fbe-dacc-4722-a4bb-9da32649ac1d.jpg",
  "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/202547418-bcd8aa90-58ef-4e48-9c60-4af5140cad0a.jpg",
  "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/202547434-c31f0f85-ae9f-437e-b10a-7beb6d3b2fe9.jpg",
  "https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/67389727/202547453-72d50fa5-ddce-4cdb-912d-a7f8e95fb0eb.jpg"
)

names <- c(
  "Thalassiosira",
  "Ceratium longipes, Dinophysis, & Pseudo-nitzschia",
  "Leptocylindrus",
  "Pseudo-nitzschia",
  "Chaetoceros"
  )
  
slickR(obj=paths, height = 250, width = "75%") %synch%
( slickR(obj=names, slideType = 'p') + settings(arrows = FALSE) )

```
